State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: This is FallUI - Inventory. A optimized Fallout 4 inventory interface for PC.
State.Name: FallUI - Inventory

State.Author: Kaethela
State.Description: Originally designed to make perk requirements from Some Assembly Required visible, this mod lets you repair power armor using repair kits. Includes optional support for Creation Club and mod-added power armor. All ESL-flagged ESP files.
State.Name: Kat's Power Armor Repair Kits

State.Author: VishVadeva50
State.Description: Patches for UFO4P and more.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (UFO4P)

State.Author: VishVadeva50
State.Description: Patches for UFO4P and more.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (UFO4P)

State.Author: F4SE Team
State.Description: The Fallout 4 Script Extender, or F4SE for short, is a modder's resource that expands the scripting capabilities of Fallout 4. It does so without modifying the executable files on disk, so there are no permanent side effects.
State.Name: Fallout 4 Script Extender (F4SE)

State.Author: reg2k - Neanka - shadowslasher410
State.Description: The Mod Configuration Menu is a settings page for mods! It provides a central location for mod configuration, accessible via the Pause menu.
State.Name: Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for bullet counted reloads with most of the features such a system should have.
State.Name: Bullet Counted Reload System (BCR)

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Untie the game speed from the framerate. Fixes physical bugs. Reduces loading time.

Now there is a separate version for VR.
State.Name: High FPS Physics Fix

State.Author: VG
State.Description: A mod that fixes some reloading issues.
State.Name: Reload Fix

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: Root Builder is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that allows you to manage files in the base game folder through Mod Organizer, leaving your game folder in pristine, vanilla condition!
State.Name: Kezyma's Root Builder for Mod Organizer

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: A highly configurable HUD. Every widget can be positioned and configured. Configure your design in the in-game layout manager in MCM. Layouts can be shared and imported too.
State.Name: FallUI - HUD

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Overhaul of the Fallout 4 map. Added list of locations and workshops including text search. Add favorite locations to fast travel with one click. Many Quality-Of-Life features like disabling the popup on empty map space click, better map zoom steps, travel and arrival time. Colored marker support. Including high-res map texture support.
State.Name: FallUI - Map

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description:
Overhaul of the sleeping and waiting menu for Fallout 4. 

Directly click on your desired wake-up time with target time buttons. See the daylight level at target time in the daytime graph and more. Interface available in all languages.
State.Name: FallUI - Sleep and Wait

State.Author: Neanka
State.Description: Favorites Menu rework in New Vegas companion wheel style.
State.Name: Favorites Menu Ex

Original.Name: PA Ownership Fix (with No PA Battery Pathing)-52315-1-0-1622200319.rar

State.Author: Selenarious
State.Description: When you take over a Power Armor that belonged to someone else and insert a fusion core, it will no longer be considered stolen! No .esp required.
State.Name: Power Armor Ownership Fix (no more stealing)

State.Author: dpillari
State.Description: added correct PBR data to the Marine Combat Armor, as it lacked it before.
State.Name: Marine Combat Armor Material Fix

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
RobCo Patcher, is a patcher based on F4SE and CommonLibF4, which allows mod authors and users to modify game data without the use of plugins.

You can modify ammos, npcs, races, weapons and more.
State.Name: RobCo Patcher

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Simply adds arms to the first person running animations, open and closed hand styles available. Includes Power Armor. Archive, loose files, or empty ESL versions.
State.Name: First-Person Running with Hands Animations

State.Author: VishVadeva50
State.Description: Patches for UFO4P and more.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (UFO4P)

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Overhaul of all confirm box interfaces. Including different designs and styles for many box types (configurable). You can also choose to disable confirms, so it automatically accept without confirmation (like "Yes Im Sure"). Interface covers all languages.
State.Name: FallUI - Confirm Boxes (incl. Yes Im Sure)

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: This mod adds new commands and overhauls existing commands within the console.
State.Name: Console Commands Extender

State.Author: Snapdragon
State.Description: Fixes the engine bug that causes workshop navmesh cuts to persist throughout all interior cells.
State.Name: Interior NavCut Fix

State.Author: ScottyDoesKnow
State.Description: Removes ammo from guns on corpses and adds it to the corpse's inventory.
State.Name: Remove Ammo from Dropped Guns

State.Author: mluppov
State.Description: This will replace ridiculous half transparent... whatever it is with something much nicer.
State.Name: Power Armor HoloHUD

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Simply adds arms to the first person swimming animations. Archive, loose files, or empty ESL available.
State.Name: First-Person Swimming Animations

Original.Name: Keep Radiants in the Commonwealth UFO4P Version-56089-1-2-1670779314.7z

State.Author: VishVadeva50
State.Description: Keep Radiants in the Commonwealth but made for users who use the unofficial patch.
State.Name: Keep Radiants in the Commonwealth UFO4P Version

State.Author: BenRierimanu
State.Description: Previsibines performance upgrade package for Fallout 4, covering the entire game. Depending on location, could give from 2 FPS to 30+ FPS increase, also includes any relevant bug fixes I can find and fix not already covered by UF4OP. Requires Season Pass / All main DLC.
State.Name: Previsibines Repair Pack

State.Author: david88m
State.Description: Small change that removes the blurring effect in weapons sight.
State.Name: Remove Ironsight Blur

State.Author: VishVadeva50
State.Description:
Balance overhaul inspired by the mod "Thrive" and "Fallout 4 Balance Patch" both made by BourneMcReady. Fixes balance issues with the original game and makes the survival aspect of it more challenging, removing shortcuts and silly mechanics. 

Choose your patches in the FOMOD.
State.Name: Thrive Redone

State.Author: Sensei Shisha
State.Description: Completely overhauls the stealth fields in Fallout 4. Now you can switch it on and off on the fly, see the remaining duration on a HUD widget, and most importantly, the enemies finally won't see you from miles away. Requires MCM and HUDFramework.
State.Name: True Invisibility Redux

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description:
A F4SE plugin that allows you to disable the hardcoded, vision-obscuring shader effect at various workbenches so you can actually see what you're crafting.



Also allows you to change the shader effect for the Power Armor station and robot workbenches to a outline-only shader instead of a full shader.
State.Name: Crafting Highlight Fix

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Reduces MCM loading time to nearly instant loading
State.Name: MCM Booster

State.Author: VishVadeva50
State.Description: Patches for UFO4P and more.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (UFO4P)

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: This mod fixes artefacts, pixelation and color banding in textures that are used for special light effects. Zero performance loss, little to nothing strain for your VRAM, no esp needed, no reason to not use it.
State.Name: Fixed Gobo Effects

State.Author: Unofficial Patch Project Team
State.Description: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for Fallout 4. The goal of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (aka UFO4P) is to eventually fix every bug with Fallout 4 not officially resolved by the developers to the limits of the Creation Kit and community-developed tools, in one easy-to-install package.
State.Name: Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch

State.Author: Ea6t
State.Description: Allows encounter zone levels to be recalculated after initial entry.
State.Name: Encounter Zone Recalculation (Continuous Level Scaling)

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Fixes an issue with the Jet script by Bethesda. 

If any NPC consumes a Jet item on survival difficulty, it will add thirst to the player. This mod contains only the fixed script as loose file. No  ESP, No ESL. Easy and clean.
State.Name: Jet Script Bug Fix

State.Author: Sheson
State.Description: Block sun rays shining through the ground with terrain underside meshes for Commonwealth, Far Harbor and Nuka World.
State.Name: Terrain Undersides - 2 Million Sunblock

State.Author: dpillari
State.Description: the wetsuit provided with Far harbor lacks any environmental mask(reflective data) in its material file. so i rewrote it to have the correct PBR data.
State.Name: Marine Wet suit Material Fix

State.Author: PK0
State.Description: Sets the distance of the shadows dynamically (F4SE)
State.Name: Shadow Boost FO4

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Your Power Armor will now fully absorb the damage of ballistic and laser weapon types.

Each armor part will work individually and absorb the damage of the body part it covers.

When one power armor part breaks, only this body part that was covered will take damage.

Keep your power armor in a good state and it will protect you.
State.Name: Better Power Armor - Redux

State.Author: akir4 and Wardaddy
State.Description: Makes the institute and standard laser weapons smaller in the 1st person.
State.Name: Laser weapons 1st person reposition

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for bullet counted reloads with most of the features such a system should have.
State.Name: Bullet Counted Reload System (BCR)

State.Author: Nukem
State.Description: A bug fix for one of the common causes of long save/autosave times.
State.Name: Long Save Bug Fix

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Better workbench interface optimized for PC. Bigger display size. Data columns. Comparision columns for mods. Item icon tag support. Icon menu for choosing your icon tag. Item subtitles. Autobuilding modules with zero cost. All languages included.
State.Name: FallUI - Workbench

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Categorize and sort your MCM Menu by Drag-and-Drop! Allows you to add your own categories into MCM. You can put any mod where you like to have it, in any order! Also comes with fancy icons and a compressed list view! Also various more Quality-of-Life features for navigating MCM.
State.Name: MCM Categorizer - Sorter Folder Categories

State.Author: VishVadeva50 - Audixas
State.Description: Makes weapon scrapping return a bigger range of materials based on what they are actually made of and with balanced amounts.
State.Name: Weapon Scrapping Redone

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which makes console menu show extra useful infomation about selected target,for example, target's name, ID, baseID, mod name and so on.This plugin also add some extra info lists to console to show selected actor's all kinds of info like factions, perks, active effects, actor values, equipments and so on.
State.Name: Better Console - F4SE

State.Author: Karandra
State.Description: This mod allows preload F4SE plugins before the game initializes.
State.Name: xSE PluginPreloader F4

State.Author: Bingle
State.Description: Fixes some glitches related to 3rd person behavior
State.Name: 3rd Person Behavior Fixes

State.Author: reg2k and Neanka
State.Description: The Extended Dialogue Interface removes the hardcoded 4-option limit on dialogue and adds full engine support for any number of player dialogue options.
State.Name: Extended Dialogue Interface

State.Author: VishVadeva50 - Wall_SoGB - Qolore7
State.Description: Files needed while following The Midnight Ride.
State.Name: The Midnight Ride Resources

Original.Name: Better Power Armor - Redux - FATE Fixes Patch-63391-1-0-1689494205.7z

State.Author: VishVadeva50
State.Description: Patches for UFO4P and more.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (UFO4P)

State.Author: BenRierimanu
State.Description: Previsibines performance upgrade package for Fallout 4, covering the entire game. Depending on location, could give from 2 FPS to 30+ FPS increase, also includes any relevant bug fixes I can find and fix not already covered by UF4OP. Requires Season Pass / All main DLC.
State.Name: Previsibines Repair Pack

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: Provides version independent IDs used for dynamically relocating offsets at runtime.
State.Name: Address Library for F4SE Plugins

State.Author: AntoniX
State.Description:
Fixed twitching/stuttering when sprinting in first person.



Исправление дрожания камеры от первого лица при спринте.
State.Name: Sprint Stuttering Fix

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: It's like buffout but for the engine
State.Name: Buffout 4

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Fixes a bug, which causes legendary enemies not to generate and drop a legendary item.
State.Name: Legendary Drop Bug Fix

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Save, load, transfer, import and export all your MCM settings at once. Transfer settings between savegames, backup your favorite settings, or send your settings to another user!
State.Name: MCM Settings Manager

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: This mod addresses a bug with the Armor Penetration System. It prevents incorrect stat overwriting when unequipping or changing weapons, ensuring accurate and consistent gameplay experience. F4SE only
State.Name: Armor Penetration Bug Fix - F4SE

State.Author: Bingle
State.Description: Fixes the magic effect condition bug that happens when you have a perk/ability for too long. Fallout 4 port of BugFixesSSE (partial)
State.Name: MGEF Condition Bug Fix

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which restores some hard-coded features disabled by game in survival mode,for example,unlock console,enable TGM,enable fast travel,restore vanilla compass settings,enalbe quick save and auto save,etc .
State.Name: Unlimited Survival Mode - F4SE

State.Author: Neagoe
State.Description: Adds the original feet to the Far Harbor marine boots.
State.Name: Far Harbor Marine Armor Boots Fix

State.Author: DoubleYou
State.Description: Enhanced Vanilla Clothing and Armor (EVAC) is a complete overhaul of the appearance of armor and clothing.
State.Name: Enhanced Vanilla Armor and Clothing - EVAC

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description: HUDFramework is a UI framework that makes it possible for mods to add new UI elements to the HUD.
State.Name: HUDFramework

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: This small mod fixes the exaggerated shine of specific objects while it's raining.
State.Name: Wetness Shader Fix

State.Author: shad0wshayd3
State.Description: Some ports from Papyrus Tweaks NG for Fallout 4.
State.Name: Baka MaxPapyrusOps

State.Author: Poet
State.Description:
FATE Patch merges >220 bug fixing and gameplay enhancing mods and addresses bugs which are not yet fixed by the Unofficial Patch (UFO4P).

The main focus of this mod is to fix bugs, make changes that make sense and introduce subtle improvements for more satisfying gameplay.
State.Name: FO4 Fixes And Technical Enhancements (FATE Patch)

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Fixes numerous texture sizing, coloration and specular errors, with the help of AI upscaling and other sources from around the Nexus.
State.Name: Targeted Textures - Vanilla textures upscaled fixed and sized

State.Author: VishVadeva50 - Wall_SoGB - Qolore7
State.Description: Files needed while following The Midnight Ride.
State.Name: The Midnight Ride Resources

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Known from Skyrim and other games, many vendors are restricted. You can't sell everything to anyone. This also prevents the player from piling up currency. This mod applies several restrictions to several NPCs. For example, a doctor can only buy and sell chem related items. But there are still some stores, where you can dump everything.
State.Name: Complex Vendors

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
You are in the middle of a fire fight, you are near death. You take all the courage you got left and run to the next cover. But then, you get hit. A message box appears. 

"Your health is low! Use a Stimpak, eat some food, or drink some water."

You click ok, then you are dead. You just got killed by the message box.

Let's fix that!
State.Name: Less intrusive tutorial

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Fixed crashes caused by Weapon Debris setting



Исправление вылетов при включенной настройке "Осколки от выстрелов"
State.Name: Weapon Debris Crash Fix

State.Author: VishVadeva50
State.Description: Makes clothing scrapping return a wider range of materials based on what they are actually made of and with balanced amounts.
State.Name: Clothing Scrapping Redone

State.Author: Snapdragon and GELUXRUM
State.Description: Engine bug fix to prevent NPCs from defaulting their outfits.
State.Name: F4SE Outfit ReDress Fix

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: Swap the "quest items can't be removed" message with something a little more informative.
State.Name: Whose Quest Is It Anyway

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Lightweight lighting aims to be an all in one simple Vanilla + Lighting overhaul. All while being as compatible as can be with no cell edits.
State.Name: Lightweight Lighting - A weather and interior lighting overhaul

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: A lightweight vanilla friendly rebalance and QOL tweak for all base game and DLC Power armor.
State.Name: Perennial Power Armor - Lightweight Power Armor Rebalance

State.Author: IceKK
State.Description: Disabled Mouse Acceleration, Horizontal/Vertical Parity, Scalable ADS Multiplier, Normalized Sensitivity
State.Name: RAW INPUT - The Ultimate Mouse Sensitivity Fix
